function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Substantial non-capture of medical services in systems without electronic data capture","Impact":"Underreporting of disease burden, delayed response to outbreaks, and inability to track disease spread.","Mitigation":"Implement electronic data capture systems, improve data collection infrastructure, and strengthen reporting mechanisms.","Technologies":"Electronic health records (EHR), data capture systems, data analytics tools.","People":"Minority populations, underserved communities, and regions with limited healthcare infrastructure.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health agencies, and governments."},{"Description":"Low visibility into health inequities and limited engagement of diverse clinical research groups","Impact":"Widening of global health inequities, disproportionate burdens of disease, and exclusion of minority populations from research.","Mitigation":"Increase transparency in data collection, actively recruit diverse clinical research groups, and prioritize equitable representation in research.","Technologies":"Health information systems, data sharing platforms, and diverse recruitment strategies.","People":"Minority populations, diverse clinical research groups, and underrepresented communities.","Owner":"Health research institutions, research organizations, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Selection bias in real-world evidence research and disparities in health-care use","Impact":"Unbalanced representation of patient disease burden, exacerbation of inequities, and potential for targeted populations to be overlooked.","Mitigation":"Address disparities in healthcare access, improve data quality and diversity, and ensure equitable representation in research studies.","Technologies":"Real-world evidence databases, healthcare utilization data, and data quality assessment tools.","People":"Underrepresented patient demographics, populations with low healthcare access, and communities with disparities in healthcare use.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and healthcare providers."}]}
